name: Kronos Rhapsody
description:
A fantasy heist story about a girl who can change the nature of time.
Made for My first Jam.
No testing done, is rough 'round the edges.

A rougelite where each mission and everything in it is based on day  and difficulty.

You Play as Sura, help her loot 364 million in 12 days to earn her freedom. Change the nature of time to gain advantage, TIME STOPS WHEN YOU MOVE.

Made by GK and Music By Rinkaku - https://soundcloud.com/theflyoccultist

Controls - 

  • WSAD  - Move 
  • Mouse - aim 
  • Left Mouse - Attack 
  • Right Mouse - Ability
  • E - action/ interact

Lotta Unity asset store stuff / third party plugins (rightfully) used here , will fill in details soon. 

May face issues in later days / difficulties, didn't had the time to fine tune the generator.
